title: Redeeming Rewards on BALL
subtitle: Make the most of your homeownership journey by redeeming rewards for added benefits and experiences.

steps.title: Accumulate Bonus Points
steps.description: Earn bonus points for every payment you make towards your home ownership journey. The more payments you make, the more points you accumulate, enhancing your rewards potential.

steps.title: Explore Rewards Catalog
steps.description: Browse through the rewards catalog to discover a variety of exciting options available for redemption. From leisure activities to lifestyle products, there's something for everyone to enjoy.

steps.title: Select Your Reward
steps.description: Choose the reward that best suits your interests and preferences. Whether you prefer a relaxing spa day, a gourmet dining experience, or a shopping spree, there's a reward waiting for you.

steps.title: Redeem Your Points
steps.description: Redeem your accumulated points to claim your chosen reward. Follow the redemption process outlined in the rewards catalog to complete the transaction and enjoy your well-deserved reward.

steps.title: Enjoy Your Reward
steps.description: Once your redemption is processed, enjoy your reward to the fullest. Treat yourself to a memorable experience or indulge in a luxurious purchase, knowing that your hard work and dedication have been rewarded.

steps.title: Continue Earning and Redeeming
steps.description: Keep earning bonus points with every payment you make on BALL and continue redeeming rewards to enhance your homeownership journey. With a wide range of rewards available, there's always something new to explore and enjoy.
